enableInfiniteScroll.title: Enable infinite scrolling
enableInfiniteScroll.description: Next set of items are loaded automatically when the users scroll to the end of the page without having to click to go to next page.

perPageLimit.title: Number of lists per page. This setting is discarded when 'Infinite scrolling' is enabled

forceLogin.title: Force Login
forceLogin.description: Require user to login by default while taking a quiz. Necessary for tracking users of a quiz. (Could be changed for each quiz)

loginPromptMessageOnQuizStart.title: 'On quiz start' Login prompt message
loginPromptMessageOnQuizStart.description: Message to be shown to the user asking for logging in on quiz start. (Leave it empty to use default message setting in 'Config' menu)

loginPromptMessageBeforeResult.title: 'Before result' Login prompt message
loginPromptMessageBeforeResult.description: Message to be shown to the user asking for logging in before viewing result. (Leave it empty to use default message setting in 'Config' menu)

disqusShortname.title: Disqus shortname
disqusShortname.description: Required only if comments system is set to 'disqus'. It can be obtained on registering your site on Disqus. Click here for more info

showSharePromptModal.title: Show share prompt modal
showSharePromptModal.description: Show share prompt modal after quiz result is shown to the user

showPageLikePrompt.title: Show page-like prompt
showPageLikePrompt.description: Show facebook page-like prompt below quiz result

enableShareLock.title: Enable Facebook Share lock for viewing result
enableShareLock.description: If set to true, users are forced to share the quiz on Facebook to view results.

inactiveQuizVisibleViaLink.title: Make inactive quizzes accessible via link
inactiveQuizVisibleViaLink.description: Let users access an 'inactive' quiz via its link. But inactive quizzes will not appear on homepage, quizzes list and related quizzes section.

showCorrectAnswerDuringQuiz.title: Show correct answer after every question (in Trivia - right/wrong quizzes)
showCorrectAnswerDuringQuiz.description: If enabled, the user will be shown if his answer is right or wrong. If wrong, the correct answer will also be shown.

showCorrectAnswersAtTheEnd.title: Show correct answers at the end of the quiz.
showCorrectAnswersAtTheEnd.description: If enabled, a 'Show correct answers' button will be displayed after the quiz is finished which lets the user view all the correct answers

youMayAlsoLikeShortCode.title: You may also like Shortcode - The short-code used to display 'You may also like' list. Click here to see available shortcodes.
youMayAlsoLikeShortCode.description: If not provided, random quizzes will be displayed.

showResultScore.title: Show user's score/percent at the end of trivia quizzes.

autoQuizStart.title: Start quiz automatically without clicking 'Start quiz' button when user visits the page.

userPicXPos.title: X coordinate position to add profile picture on result images (In pixels). You can override this per quiz in quiz editor

userPicYPos.title: Y coordinate position to add profile picture on result images (In pixels). You can override this per quiz in quiz editor

userPicSize.title: The size (Width and height of a square photo) of the profile picture on result images (In pixels). You can override this per quiz in quiz editor
